entries.description: Fix cloud-init bootstraping issues on Ubuntu 22.04 on Azure.
Fix support for Rockylinux 8 on AWS.
Fix a bug where unrequired `cloud-config` secret was being propagated to the user clusters.
Fix: use correct networkpolicy port for metrics-server.
Address inconsistencies in Helm that lead to an Application being stuck in "pending-install".
Add Kubernetes 1.28.x support for cluster-autoscaler addon.
